name: WhizzyVerse Neon Hoodie
description: Premium black hoodie with electric cyan and purple logo. Glow-in-the-dark print on back featuring the iconic 'W' waveform design.

name: Cyber Groove T-Shirt
description: Soft cotton tee with holographic WhizzyVerse logo. Limited edition design from the Cyber Nights collection.

name: DJ Whizzy Baseball Cap
description: Embroidered cap with neon cyan stitching. Adjustable strap, one size fits all.

name: Holographic Sticker Pack
description: Set of 10 holographic stickers featuring WhizBot, logo variations, and iconic track artwork.

name: WhizzyVerse Vinyl Record - Neon Dreams
description: Limited edition vinyl pressing of the hit track 'Neon Dreams'. Comes with exclusive artwork poster.

name: Electric Soul Tour Poster
description: 18x24 inch glossy poster from the Electric Soul tour. Signed by DJ Whizzy.

name: Neon Rave Backpack
description: Durable backpack with reflective neon strips and WhizzyVerse branding. Perfect for festivals.

name: WhizBot Enamel Pin
description: Limited edition enamel pin featuring WhizBot's holographic design. Collectible item!

name: Sound Dimension Bundle
description: Complete fan bundle: Hoodie, T-shirt, Cap, Sticker Pack, and signed poster. Save 20%!
